client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

query.description: The search query. Institutions with names matching the query are returned

products.description: Filter the Institutions based on whether they support all products listed in `products`. Provide `null` to get institutions regardless of supported products. Note that when `auth` is specified as a product, if you are enabled for Instant Match or Automated Micro-deposits, institutions that support those products will be returned even if `auth` is not present in their product array.

items.title: Products
items.description: A list of products that an institution can support. All Items must be initialized with at least one product. The Balance product is always available and does not need to be specified during initialization.

country_codes.description: Specify which country or countries to include institutions from, using the ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code standard. In API versions 2019-05-29 and earlier, the `country_codes` parameter is an optional parameter within the `options` object and will default to `[US]` if it is not supplied.
